title: Play Store set to integrate AI-generated FAQs
description:
Google looks to be gearing up to incorporate even more of its AI capabilities into the Play Store. TheSpAndroid, in its deep dive into the Play Store’s 38.4.12 version, stumbled upon strings hinting at a new AI feature that involves generating Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) for developers’ apps. The discovered strings indicate Google’s intentions to... Read more »

The post Play Store set to integrate AI-generated FAQs appeared first on Developer Tech News.
